column2: "Na Samuel wui; na Israel nyinara poon hɔnho hyiae
column3: na wogyaam no
column4: na wosiee no wɔ ne fie wɔ Rama. Na David soɛree
column5: na osii mu kɔr Paran sar no do."

column2: "Na banyin bi wɔ Maon a n'egyapadze wɔ Karmel; na banyin no yɛ nyimpa kɛse
column3: na ɔwɔ nguan mpemebiasa
column4: na mpɔnkye apem: nna orususua no nguan ho wɔ Karmel."

column2: "Na banyin no ne dzin dze Nabal; na ne yer ne dzin dze Abigail: na ɔbaa no wɔ ntseasee papa
column3: na no ho yɛ fɛw: naaso banyin no dze ɔyɛ dzen
column4: na ne ndzeyɛe muo; na ofi Kaleb fie."

column2: "Na David tsee no wɔ sar no do dɛ Nabal rususua no nguan ho."
"Na David somaa mberantsɛ du
column3: na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column4: Hom mfow nkɔ Karmel
column5: na wɔnkɔ Nabal hɔ
column6: na wɔnkɔbɔ me dzin nkyia no:"

column2: "na dɛm na hom nse nyia a ɔtse no atseyie mu no
column3: dɛ
column4: Asomdwee nka ɔwo
column5: na asomdwee nka wo fie so
column6: na asomdwee nka dza ewɔ nyinara."

column2: "Na afei matse dɛ ewɔ nguansusuafo: wo nguanhwɛfo afei wɔnye hɛn atsena
column3: na yɛannyɛ hɔn bɔn
column4: nkyii so hɔn biribiara annyew
column5: wɔ mber a wɔdze wɔ Karmel no nyinara."

column2: "Bisa wo mberantsɛ no
column3: na wɔbɛka akyerɛ wo: dɛm ntsi ma mberantsɛ no nnya w'enyim enyimnyam: na yɛaba da pa mu: meserɛ wo
column4: fa biribiara a ɔbɔtɔ wo nsamu ma wo nkowaa
column5: na wo ba David."

column2: "Na David ne mberantsɛ no bae no
column3: wɔkaa nsɛm no nyinara kyerɛɛ Nabal wɔ David ne dzin mu
column4: na wɔyɛɛ foo."

column2: "Na Nabal buaa David no nkowaa no
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: David nye woana? Na Jesse ne ba no nye woana
column5: nkowaa pii na ndɛ ber yi woguan fi hɔn wuranom nkyɛn."

column2: "Aso nkyii memfa m'edziban
column3: na mo nsu
column4: na me nam a meku medze rema mo nguansusuafo
column5: memma nkorɔfo a minnyim mbrɛ wofi?"

column2: "Nna David ne mberantsɛ no daan hɔnho faa hɔn kwan do
column3: na wɔsanee
column4: na wɔbae bɛkaa nsɛm yi nyinara kyerɛɛ no."

column2: "Na David see ne mbarimba no dɛ
column3: Hom nyinara wɔmfa hom mfona mbobɔ. Na hɔn nyinara dze hɔn mfona bobɔe; na David so dze n'afona bɔe: na nyimpa bɛyɛ ahaanan na wɔka David no do; na ahaenu na wɔtsenaa ndzɛmba no ho."

column2: "Na mberantsɛ no mu baako kɛkaa kyerɛɛ Abigail
column3: Nabal ne yer no
column4: dɛ
column5: Hwɛ
column6: David somaa abɔfo fi sar no do dɛ woribekyia hɛn wura; na otutuu hɔn akakanyi."

column2: "Na mbarimba no woye ma hɛn dodow
column3: na wɔannyɛ hɛn bɔn
column4: nkyii so yɛannyew biribiara mber tsentsen a yɛnye hɔn nenamee
column5: wɔ aber a yɛwɔ haban mu no:"

column2: "wɔyɛɛ fadum maa hɛn adzesaa na adzekyee nyina
column3: wɔ mber tsentsen ara a yɛnye hɔn wɔ hɔ rohwɛ nguan no nyinara."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei hwɛ na dwen dza ebɛyɛ; na mbusu na wɔakyerɛ no wɔ hɛn wura
column3: na ne fi nyinara do: na ɔyɛ sansanyi dodow dɛ obi nntum nnkasa nnkyerɛ no."

column2: "Nna Abigail yɛɛ ntsɛm
column3: na ɔkɛfaa ntɔwmu ahaenu na wenyin mbɔdambɔ ebien
column4: na nguan enum a woesiesie no dada
column5: na eburow kyewee esusudze enum

column2: "Na ɔsee ne mberantsɛ no dɛ
column3: Hom ndzi m'enyim kan nkɔ; hwɛ
column4: midzi hom ekyir. Na ɔannka annkyerɛ no kun Nabal."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: ɔtse n'asoaso do
column4: na orisian aba bepɔw no ase no
column5: hwɛ
column6: David na ne mbarimba no sianee behyiaa no; na ohyiaa hɔn."

column2: "Nna David aka dɛ
column3: Ampaara gyan ara gyan na mahwɛ dza akowaa yi wɔ no wɔ sar no do no nyinara do
column4: ma dza ɔyɛ nedze no nyinara no mu kor ara annyew: nna ɔdze bɔn ahyɛ me papa ananmu yi."

column2: "Sɛ ondu mbrɛ anapa enyim ntsetsew na megya dza ɔwɔ no nyinara mu abɔdomaba ɔbanyin kor mpo a
column3: ɔno Nyankopɔn nyɛ David n'atamfo dɛm
column4: na dza ɔkyɛn dɛm so."

column2: "Na Abigail hun David no
column3: ɔyɛɛ ntsɛm
column4: na ofii n'asoaso do dwirii
column5: na ɔhwee David n'enyim dze n'enyim butuuw famu
column6: na ɔbɔɔ no mu adze kɔr famu."

column2: "Na otwae hwee n'ananadze
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Mo do a
column5: mo wura
column6: mo do na emumuyɛ no nda: na meserɛ wo

column2: "Meserɛ wo
column3: mma mo wura nntsin sansanyi yi do
column4: mekyerɛ Nabal no a: na dɛ mbrɛ ne dzin tse no
column5: mbrɛ ɔnoara so tse nye no; ne dzin dze Nabal
column6: na nkwaseadze nye no tse: na emi w'afonabaa dze
column7: mennhu mo wura ne mberantsɛ a esomaa hɔn no."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei
column3: mo wura
column4: dɛ EWURADZE tse ase yi
column5: na dɛ wo kra tse ase yi
column6: susuampa dɛ EWURADZE atwe wo ekyir wɔ bɔgya ho so ho
column7: na ɔamma ammfa woara wo nsa enndzi wer amma woho no
column10: na hɔn a wɔpɛ mo wura bɔn no nnyɛ dɛ Nabal."

column2: "Na afei akyɛdze yi a w'afonabaa dze abrɛ mo wura yi
column3: ma wɔmfa mma mberantsɛ a wodzi mo wura ekyir no."

column2: "Meserɛ wo
column3: fa w'afonabaa no mfom kyɛ no: na ampaara EWURADZE bɛkyekyer ofie a otsim ama mo wura
column4: osiandɛ mo wura na ɔko EWURADZE no ko; na worunnhu bɔn bi wɔ wo mu wo nda nyinara."

column2: "Na kaansa ɔdasanyi soɛr dɛ oritsiw wo
column3: na ɔrohwehwɛ wo kra mpo a
column4: mo wura ne kra dze
column5: wɔbɛkyekyer no nkwa boaba no mu wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn nkyɛn; na w'atamfo hɔn akra dze
column6: ɔbɔtow hɔn tsiabo mu dɛ wofi tsiabo no tokur mu."

column2: "Na ɔbɛba dɛ sɛ EWURADZE nya yɛ mo wura yie dɛ mbrɛ ɔaka no wɔ wo ho no nyinara
column3: na ɔhyɛ wo hen wɔ Israel do a
column5: "ɔno iyi nnkɛyɛ wo awerɛhow
column6: anaa akoma mu fintsidua ama mo wura
column8: anaa dɛ mo wura edzi wer ama noho: na sɛ EWURADZE nya nye mo wura dzi no yie a

column2: "Na David see Abigail dɛ
column3: nhyira nka EWURADZE
column4: Israel Nyankopɔn no a ɔsomaa wo ndɛ da yi
column5: dɛ nye me mbedzi ehyia no:"

column2: "na nhyira nka wo nyansaa
column3: na nhyira nka wo
column4: ɔwo a ndɛ da yi atwe me ekyir wɔ bɔgya ho so ho
column5: na amma mammfa mara me nsa ennkedzi wer amma moho."

column2: "Nokwar nye yi
column3: dɛ EWURADZE Israel Nyankopɔn no a ɔatwe me ekyir ma mannyɛ wo bɔn no tse ase yi
column4: sɛ annka woho ammba emmbehyia me kwan a
column5: nkyɛ ampaara dɛ ondu anapa enyim tsetsewee no nna abɔdomaba ɔbanyin kor mpo nnkae mmaa Nabal."

column2: "Nna David gyee dza ɔdze brɛɛ no wɔ ne nsamu: na ɔsee no dɛ
column3: Fow kɔ wo fie asomdwee mu; hwɛ
column4: metsie wo ndze
column5: na mahwɛ w'enyim."

column2: "Na Abigail baa Nabal nkyɛn; na
column3: hwɛ
column4: ɔato pon wɔ ne fie
column5: dɛ ɔhen bi no pon
column6: na Nabal n'akoma enyi agye wɔ no mu
column7: osiandɛ ɔabow tetaa: dɛm ntsi ɔannka hwee annkyerɛ no
column10: ma okodur anapa enyim tsetsewee ana."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ anapa no a nsa no fii Nabal n'enyi do no
column3: nna ne yer no kaa nsɛm yi kyerɛɛ no
column4: na n'akoma gyenee wɔ no mu
column5: na ɔtɔɔ imum."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: bɛyɛ n'ekyir dadu no nna EWURADZE bɔɔ Nabal ma owui."

column2: "Na aber a David tsee dɛ Nabal ewu no
column3: ɔsee dɛ
column4: Nhyira nka EWURADZE a oedzi m'enyimguase ho asɛm wɔ Nabal nsamu
column5: na ɔatwe n'akowaa ekyir wɔ bɔn ho: na Nabal ne ndzeyɛbɔn no EWURADZE ama ɔasan ebua narankasa n'etsifi. Na David somae ma wɔkɛkaa Abigail no ho asɛm dɛ wɔnkɛfa no mbrɛ no ma ɔnwar no."

column2: "Na David no nkowaa no dur Abigail nkyɛn wɔ Karmel no
column3: wɔkaa kyerɛɛ no dɛ
column4: David asoma hɛn wo hɔ
column5: dɛ yɛmbɛfa wo nkɛma no ma ɔnwar wo."

column2: "Na ɔsoɛree
column3: na ɔbɔɔ no mu adze dze n'enyim boom daadze
column4: na ɔsee dɛ
column5: Hwɛ
column6: w'afonabaa yɛ abaawa dɛ ɔhohor mo wura no nkowaa hɔn anan ho."

column2: "Na Abigail yɛɛ ntsɛm soɛree
column3: na ɔtsenaa asoaso do; na ɔnye ne mbaawa beenum na osii mu dzii David n'abɔfoe no ekyir kɔree
column4: na ɔbɛyɛɛ ne yer."

column2: "David faa Ahinoam a ofi Jezreel no so; na hɔn beenu nyina bɛyɛɛ ne yernom."
"Afei nna Saul dze ne babaa Mikal
column3: David ne yer no
column4: ama Palti
column5: Lais a ofi Galim no ne ba no."
